abstract: Spyker, the Dutch sports car maker, saved Saab from certain demise, but the former unit of General Motors still has a long road back to health, judging from last month’s sales.
snippet: Spyker, the Dutch sports car maker, saved Saab from certain demise, but the former unit of General Motors still has a long road back to health, judging from last month’s sales.
lead_paragraph: Spyker, the Dutch sports car maker, saved Saab from certain demise, but the former unit of General Motors still has a long road back to health, judging from last month’s sales.

headline.main: Saab May Have a Future, but Its Present Is Rough
